alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 1:03AM CDT until August 10 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JOHNSON COUNTY... At 103 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Pettigrew, or 18 miles northwest of Clarksville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Devils Knob... Friley... Ozone... Wolf Pen Campground... Catalpa... Oark... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for western Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
